BIO

Florida State College at Jacksonville
Degree Anticipated December 2019

The Associate in Science (A.S.) in Computer Information Technology degree program prepares FSCJ students for designing, coding, and modifying websites, from layout to function according to individual's specifications. As a student, I strive to create visually appealing sites that feature user-friendly design and clear navigation.

Medtronic

Team Member

Performs manufacturing processes, various operations, and uses equipment to make a product. Pick parts from stock for all manufacturing value streams. Participate in new projects and apply Six Sigma and LEAN methodology for continuous improvement of the company.

Vagabond Coffee Co.

Website Administrator | Branch Manager

Continually make enhancements to corporate websites to enhance user experiencing and provide better search results. Managing day-today operation at the café, coordinate with vendors and order supplies, as needed. Maintain updated records of daily, weekly, and monthly revenues and expenses.
